title: I spy. Total loss
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Alfred J Hitchcock Productions, production company
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Alfred Hitchcock presents". Two more fine tales from the vault of the master of the macabre. "I spy": Pompous old Captain Morgan's wife has up and left him, without so much as a note to let him know where she is. So he has hired private detective, Mr. Fruit to spy on her and see what she's up to. Mr. Fruit poses as a waiter at the restaurant where she works and waits to see if she has found a gentleman friend... "Total loss": A widow is left with a clothing business, but her head for business is no match for her sense of style. She is in debt and beginning to get desperate when she is tempted by an insurance scam...
related_objects: Series; S01132; Alfred Hitchcock presents; Active; 1955
